Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
Player
HumanPlayer
public class HumanPlayer extends Player
This class is subclass of the Player class that gets it's moves from the input in the console
Version:
1
Author:

    • getUserInput

      public int getUserInput​(String prompt)
      Reads and returns an input from the user (if it is an integer), if the input is not an int or can't be read in them the prompt is reprinted out and we continue to wait for a valid input
      Parameters:
      prompt - The String prompt to be printed out to the user
      Returns:
      the integer entered by the HumanPlayer
